title: Florida rejects 41% of new math textbooks, citing critical race theory among its reasons - CNN
content:
1. Florida rejects 41% of new math textbooks, citing critical race theory among its reasons  CNN
  2. Gov. Ron DeSantis speaks about banned textbooks  WPTV News - FL Palm Beaches and Treasure Coast
  3. Florida rejects 41% of math textbooks for including CRT, most aimed at K-5 students: 'Impermissible'  Fox News
  4. The dark, scary road of censorship in Florida | Letters to the editor  South Florida Sun Sentinel
  5. Ron DeSantis takes his culture war to the next level  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Florida Department of Education announced Friday the state has rejected more than 50 math textbooks from next school year's curriculum, citing references to critical race theory among reasons for the rejections.
